name: get_schedule
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool league_of_legends_esports.
Tool description: This api gives you all of the lol esports leagues , vods, tournaments, match , game , event details with videos , scheadule , standings, teams and their players. And live game score.
API description: In this method you can get all schedule for the leagues. You can filter multiple leagueId with join %  seperator.

leagueid.description: A string containing league IDs separated by '%2C' to filter schedules for multiple leagues.
